AboutMe:
B.S. Computer Science, Western Michigan University.
[ CV ]

I have professional experience developing in C#, VB.NET, PostgreSQL, PHP, and some C. I've used C++ and Java for a number of educational projects, and I'm currently building a personal website using Python, Flask, and mongoDB.

  • I'm no expert, but I'd love any opportunity to write more Haskell.
  • I also enjoy Code Contracts and LINQ-to-Entities.
